<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.asset_management" name="Asset Management" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" help="ITIL_Asset_Management" state="published" licensable="true">
<description>Asset Management plugin used to manage all your assets, consumables and software licenses. </description> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.expense_line" /> <import plugin="com.snc.model" /> <import plugin="com.snc.organization_management" /> <import plugin="com.snc.fixed_asset" /> <import plugin="com.snc.depreciation" /> <import plugin="com.snc.automation" /> <import plugin="com.glideapp.home" /> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AssetMgmtUtil" class="com.snc.asset_management.AssetMgmtUtil" /> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Asset Management plugin used to manage all your assets, consumables and software licenses.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=ITIL_Asset_Management</help> <id>com.snc.asset_management</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Asset Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.asset_management/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.expense_line,com.snc.model,com.snc.organization_management,com.snc.fixed_asset,com.snc.depreciation,com.snc.automation,com.glideapp.home</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.asset_management</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
